Today is #EqualPayDay. That means if a man and a woman each start working on Jan. 1, 2018, what the man is paid by the end of Dec. 2018 wouldn't be paid to the woman until today – April 2, 2019! And it means that it takes 15 months for women to receive what men make in a year! pic.twitter.com/b71J4cZvx2
